subject: [sugar] Testing sugar with last cairo / pycairo
body:
I have compiled sugar with cairo 1.4.6 and pycairo 1.4.0 and all is working ok.diff --git a/build-scripts/freedesktop.modules b/build-scripts/freedesktop.modulesindex f2c7e4a..1fa53a9 100644--- a/build-scripts/freedesktop.modules
+++ b/build-scripts/freedesktop.modules@@ -2,16 +2,16 @@ <!DOCTYPE moduleset SYSTEM "moduleset.dtd"> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="moduleset.xsl"?> <moduleset>
-  <tarball id="cairo" version="1.4.0">-    <source href="http://cairographics.org/releases/cairo-1.4.0.tar.gz"
-            md5sum="b0882df4621bcf5b69f024b9475f8d4e" size="3067230"/>+  <tarball id="cairo" version="1.4.6">+    <source href="
http://cairographics.org/releases/cairo-1.4.6.tar.gz"+            md5sum="ae16e73f9dca46ac93b4ce435e93773c" size="3181592"/>     <dependencies>       <dep package="gtk-doc"/>
     </dependencies>   </tarball>-  <tarball id="pycairo" version="1.2.2">-    <source href="http://cairographics.org/releases/pycairo-1.2.2.tar.gz
"-            md5sum="83a2e06d9fc3530753701d580a18087e" size="482417"/>+  <tarball id="pycairo" version="1.4.0">+    <source href="
http://cairographics.org/releases/pycairo-1.4.0.tar.gz"+            md5sum="e26e77919b606113f565d70036c1f504" size="479455"/>     <dependencies>       <dep package="cairo"/>
     </dependencies>
Gonzalo Odiard
